HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Rimworld 1.0| Minimum update for 1.0 compatability| **New food restriction feature NOT supported by this mod**| -New policy : Meals only + raw. Eats the raw food before package survival meals and pemmican. Usefull for caravans.|
Silage and VGP| Animals will now eat silage from Vegetable Garden.|

Survival Foods Rework| New food category survival meals:| -They will now be consumed after more perishable meal options (including nutrient paste) using standard policies. -Includes survival meals and pemmican. -Colonists will still pick them up into their inventory in-line with vanilla behavior, but they will choose other options come meal time if available. -Pets should now mostly ignore them opting for raw foods first. -Most policies have the lowest priority on survival meals.| Bug fix| -Rescued Space Refugees / Wild Men were not being assigned a policy and would only be fed with corpses.| Compatibility| -Fixed compatibility with RimFridge. Colonists will now use wall fridges.
<size=20>Herbivore animals bug fix</size>| Fixed herbivore animals never eating grass.| Enjoy !
<size=20>B19 update</size>| Smarter Food Selection now for B19.| Please note that this mod is unmaintained and that this is a minimum update for B19.| The mod might be unstable.
Hotfix| Compatibility| * Zombieland by Pardekei. * All Star Wars mods by Jecrell. * Perhaps more mods...| Misc| * General compatibility enhancement. * Enhanced conflicts messages.
Updated to A17| Minor changes| * Forcing paste dispense will now show a message if available energy is insufficient.

Hotfix| UI Change| * New inspect tab. UI is no more shown inside the needs tab.| Bugs fixes| * Error messages (yellow) after selling stuff to traders.| * Pets still hunting prisoners (oops). * Pets will not hunt humans at all anymore (even hostile ones).

<size=16>Hotfix</size>|Fixed bug with colonists and visitors not eating their food in inventory\nVisitors won't steal your food anymore !|Can now make visitors use their vanilla behavior in settings.|Fixed insects affected by a food policy and trying to fetch other foods than their jelly.|Added scheduled food search cache clearing. This might improve performances a bit.
